title: Scientists ID new metabolic target to prevent, treat heart failure at earliest stage

title_detail.value: Scientists ID new metabolic target to prevent, treat heart failure at earliest stage

summary: Researchers have identified a metabolic process in the heart that, if treated, could someday prevent or slow the progression of heart failure.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have identified a metabolic process in the heart that, if treated, could someday prevent or slow the progression of heart failure.
